title: Hint
text: Use Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ to find the total force resisting the motion of the car, boat, and trailer. Consider the given force and acceleration, as well as the mass of the system.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Apply Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ to find the total force resisting the motion of the car, boat, and trailer. Step 2: Clearly show all calculations and units.
